song.title: Open the Eyes of My Heart
song.lyrics:
[V] .A Open the eyes of my heart, Lord .E Open the eyes of my heart . D A I want to see You, I want to see You
[C] . E F#m To see You high and lifted up .D E Shining in the light of Your glory . F#m Pour out Your power and love . D As we sing holy, holy, holy
[B] .A Holy, holy, holy .E Holy, holy, holy .D Holy, holy, holy . A I want to see You.
